sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS u_no
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = :P1 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountMobile
FROM m_users
WHERE user_mobile = :P1 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET user_fname = :P1 /* {{$_POST.name}} */, user_type = :P2 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */, u_status = :P3 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, updated_by = :P4 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, scheme_id = :P6 /* {{$_POST.scheme_id}} */, aadhar_no = :P7 /* {{$_POST.aadhar}} */, pan_no = :P8 /* {{$_POST.pan}} */, address = :P9 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, pin = :P10 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, state = :P11 /* {{$_POST.state}} */, district = :P12 /* {{$_POST.district}} */, aeps_merchant_id = :P13 /* {{$_POST.aeps_merchant}} */, blank3 = :P14 /* {{$_POST.firm_name}} */, user_email = :P15 /* {{$_POST.email}} */
WHERE id = :P16 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET user_mobile = :P1 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */, user_fname = :P2 /* {{$_POST.name}} */, user_type = :P3 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */, u_status = :P4 /* {{$_POST.status}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, scheme_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.scheme_id}} */, aadhar_no = :P8 /* {{$_POST.aadhar}} */, pan_no = :P9 /* {{$_POST.pan}} */, address = :P10 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, pin = :P11 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, state = :P12 /* {{$_POST.state}} */, district = :P13 /* {{$_POST.district}} */, aeps_merchant_id = :P14 /* {{$_POST.aeps_merchant}} */, blank3 = :P15 /* {{$_POST.firm_name}} */, user_email = :P16 /* {{$_POST.email}} */, blank2 = :P17 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */
WHERE id = :P18 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE t_scheme_user
SET scheme1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme0}} */, scheme2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme1}} */, scheme3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme2}} */, scheme4 = :P4 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme3}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, for_user_type = '2'
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE t_scheme_user
SET scheme1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme0}} */, scheme2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme1}} */, scheme3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme2}} */, scheme4 = :P4 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme3}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, for_user_type = '3'
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

UPDATE cc_pageaccess
SET access_page1 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.support == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page2 = :P2 /* {{$_POST.PendingTrans == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page3 = :P3 /* {{$_POST.TransReport == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page4 = :P4 /* {{$_POST.LiveTrans == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page5 = :P5 /* {{$_POST.ViewUsers == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page6 = :P6 /* {{$_POST.UpdateTxn == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page7 = :P7 /* {{$_POST.BrowseTickets == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, access_page8 = :P8 /* {{$_POST.OtherTickets == 'true' ? 1 : 0}} */, updated_by = :P9 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P10 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE ccuser_id = :P11 /* {{$_POST.UserId}} */

db:notexists.message: Mobile No. already exists in database.

sql.query:
INSERT INTO m_users
(user_id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_email, password, salt, user_type, u_status, created_by, created_on, user_lname, cap_amt, balance_amt, balance_outstanding, aeps_balance, scheme_id, aadhar_no, pan_no, address, pin, state, district, blank1, blank2, md_id, ds_id, user_tpin, blank3, kyc_status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UniqueID}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.name}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.email.lowercase()}} */, :P5 /* {{password.sha256(NOW)}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.user_type}} */, '1', :P8 /* {{identity}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{'https://github.com/ado.png'}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', :P11 /* {{$_POST.scheme_id}} */, :P12 /* {{$_POST.aadhar}} */, :P13 /* {{$_POST.pan}} */, :P14 /* {{$_POST.address}} */, :P15 /* {{$_POST.pin}} */, :P16 /* {{$_POST.state}} */, :P17 /* {{$_POST.district}} */, :P18 /* {{password}} */, :P19 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */, '0', '0', :P20 /* {{1234}} */, :P21 /* {{$_POST.firm_name}} */, :P22 /* {{3}} */)

INSERT INTO t_scheme_user
(user_id, scheme1, scheme2, scheme3, scheme4, created_by, created_on, for_user_type) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme0}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme1}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme2}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.dtscheme3}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, '2')

INSERT INTO t_scheme_user
(user_id, scheme1, scheme2, scheme3, scheme4, created_by, created_on, for_user_type) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme0}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme1}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme2}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.rtscheme3}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, '3')

INSERT INTO cc_pageaccess
(ccuser_id, access_page1, access_page2, access_page3, access_page4, access_page5, access_page6, access_page7, access_page8, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.support}} */, :P3 /* {{$_POST.PendingTrans}} */, :P4 /* {{$_POST.TransReport}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.LiveTrans}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.ViewUsers}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.UpdateTxn}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.BrowseTickets}} */, :P9 /* {{$_POST.OtherTickets}} */, :P10 /* {{identity}} */, :P11 /* {{NOW}} */)

SELECT api_code, username, api_password, api_type, senderid, api_url
FROM m_api
WHERE api_type = :P1 /* {{'Whatsapp'}} */ AND status = 1

params.message:
{{'Dear '+$_POST.name+', Your Account has been created successfully. User Login Id  '+$_POST.mobile+', Password  is '+password+' and default TPIN is 1234 .
Update Password and TPIN after login to web portal or mobile app.
Thanks for using our services. 😊
Regards 
S W Pay Team

'}}

sql.query:
SELECT m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password, m_api.senderid, m_api.api_url, sms_api.entity_id, sms_api.template_id
FROM m_api
LEFT JOIN t_sms_api_details AS sms_api ON (sms_api.api_id = m_api.id)
WHERE m_api.api_type = :P1 /* {{'SMS'}} */ AND m_api.status = 1 AND sms_api.sms_code = :P2 /* {{'ADDU'}} */ AND sms_api.status = '1'

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_sms_log
(sms_message, sender_mobile, created_on, sms_type, ip_address, status, response, user_id, extra1) VALUES (:P1 /* {{'Dear Partner, Your Account has been created successfully. User Name '+$_POST.mobile+' Password  '+password+' TPIN XXXX . Thanks for using our service.\nRegards S W Pay Team'}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.mobile}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{'Add New User SMS'}} */, :P5 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P6 /* {{api_status == 200 ? 1 : 0}} */, :P7 /* {{api_response}} */, :P8 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P9 /* {{'Admin Portal'}} */)
